actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to make eligible for annuities payable under section 4 of Public Law 92-425 (relating to the Armed Forces Survivor Benefit Plan) persons who became widows during the 18-month period following the effective date of such law.

summary.text: Makes eligible for annuities payable under the Armed Forces Survivor Benefit Plan, those persons who became widows during the eighteen-month period (now twelve-month period) following the effective date of such law.

titles.title: A bill to make eligible for annuities payable under section 4 of Public Law 92-425 (relating to the Armed Forces Survivor Benefit Plan) persons who became widows during the 18-month period following the effective date of such law.
